products.title: Metallic 50mm Brushstroke Silver Tr0950 Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The metallic range offers the best urban and contemporary feel of the metallic blind that will add a character to any space. Add something different to the style of any room with their metallic 50mm brushstroke silver venetian blind. This blind is ideal with neutral colour schemes. Product id: db-trven0164 fabric colour: brushstroke silver t0950 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 50mm slat material: aluminium control type: raise and lower cords / clearwand tilt energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes metallic 50mm brushstroke silver tr0950 aluminium venetian in grey.

products.description: The metallic range offers the best urban and contemporary feel of the metallic blind that will add a character to any space. Add something different to the style of any room with their metallic 50mm metallic stardust venetian blind. This blind is ideal with neutral colour schemes. Product id: db-trven0160 fabric colour: metallic stardust t0713 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 50mm slat material: aluminium control type: raise and lower cords / clearwand tilt energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes metallic 50mm metallic stardust tr0713 aluminium venetian in grey.

products.title: Decor, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: For graceful style with captivating decoration, choose the dcor in cameo where textured fibres fuse to produce an elegant creamy blind with distinctive, crescent detailing and compelling texture. This exquisite cloth sits on separate, tilting slats that allow you to control the amount of ventilation and light infiltrating the room. For a classy dining area with striking features, combine the cameo with shimmering table runners and silky serviettes.

products.title: Decor, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Ecostyle Opal Faux Wood
products.description: An effortless way to update your home, the ecostyle opal faux wood blind boasts a contemporary silhouette and comes in a modern mid cream/stoney beige shade. It's designed from a sturdy pvc material with a light grain effect for an authentic look and feel that mocks the natural texture of real wood. Thanks to its fully waterproof finish, the blind works well in bathrooms and kitchens. Product id: sdb-wsb0798 fabric colour: opal material: upvc headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 35mm,50mm slat material: embossed finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes ecostyle opal faux wood in cream.

products.title: Ecostyle Cloud Faux Wood
products.description: Update your window space with the cloud collection. Their ecostyle cloud cream blind from the collection is made from a faux wood material and features a wonderfully smooth finish. Cleaning is no issue & you can wipe the slats with a wet cloth without damaging them thanks to its fully waterproof finish. Product id: sdb-wsb0809 fabric colour: cloud material: upvc headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: smooth finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes ecostyle cloud faux wood in cream.

products.title: Lux Raspberry Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
